replies.body:
Add Throwback for one day each week, instead of completely removing it. Do it one week Monday, next Tuesday, Wednesday, etc. That way everybody will have a chance depending on when you have free time usually. 

Throwback was made for nostalgia. Well it's not really nostalgia if it's on all the time, and having it completely removed is a waste of a good server so putting it on once in a while will be a good solution I think.
.

Just to add on to what {tag=0f2408c6b4554076a115d9ea6c81a335} said, Throwback once a week would be cool. Maybe the weekend would be the best option as that is when user traffic is at its peak.

Also, glad to see builder applications will be released soon.

replies.body:
People want Throwback back... don't you say you want the server to grow? 

The staleness of Throwback for two years is, among other things what led Avicus to have a player count of less than 50, and to drive new players away. 

Imagine if you add it back. Twenty guys will be happy, but you will scare away any new player. If Avicus wants to grow, this is not the way.
